sentences.english: Apply BF1 Hair Growth Conditioner onto scalp. Gently massage for 5 minutes then rinse Off.
sentences.chinese: 把護髮精華搽在頭皮上，按摩5分鐘，把頭髮洗淨。

sentences.english: He is going to scalp me or burn me at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 他要剝掉我的頭皮或是在火刑柱上燒我。

sentences.english: His hair was plastered down to his scalp by the rain.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭髮淋雨後緊貼在頭皮上。

sentences.english: Among them there were 20 total and one partial scalp avulsion.
sentences.chinese: 在全頭皮撕脫中有3例爲多塊頭皮撕裂。

sentences.english: Among them there were 20 total and one partial scalp avulsion.

sentences.english: He recommends regular hot water rinses and massaging of the scalp with fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 他建議使用溫熱水漂洗，而且用手指點觸按摩頭皮。

sentences.english: But our boss started to talk, curassow also has upgrade of toughen one's scalp-brace oneself to rush only.
sentences.chinese: 但是俺們老闆都開口了，大鳥也只有硬着頭皮往上衝。

sentences.english: Without you, today's emotions, would be the scurf of yesterday's.
sentences.chinese: 沒有你，今日的心情就只是昨日的頭皮屑。

sentences.english: Her voice gets on my nerves.
sentences.chinese: 她的聲音今我頭皮發麻。

sentences.english: Tinea capitis is manifested by pustular eruptions of the scalp, with scaling and bald patches.
sentences.chinese: 頭癬是補丁表現爲膿皰爆發的禿頭頭皮，具有縮放和。

sentences.english: A gel might work better for areas covered with hair, such as the scalp.
sentences.chinese: 膠類產品更適合同於有毛髮的地方，如頭皮處。

sentences.english: Helen: Well, if you do something wrong, you could say ‘I didn’t finish my work, so I have to face the music.’
sentences.chinese: 就是說“我沒做完功課，所以我得硬着頭皮挨訓了”。

sentences.english: Massage the scalp, improve blood circulation, prevent hair white.
sentences.chinese: 推拿頭皮，改進血循環，防備頭髮變白。

sentences.english: Pressure should be applied to bleeding sites such as a de-gloving scalp wound.
sentences.chinese: 應該對下頜部頭皮傷的出血部位進行加壓。

sentences.english: This shampoo will cure your dandruff.
sentences.chinese: 這種洗髮液可以防治頭皮屑。

sentences.english: Helpless, shine on a demon mirror to only have crustily skin of head, skill hold bomb to arrive at before.
sentences.chinese: 無奈，照妖鏡只有硬着頭皮，一手託着炸彈來到陣前。
